content: add a bear-y cute little pal to your stuffie collection with this adorable toy by sarah zimmerman of repeat crafter me worked in red heart super saver this project features simple techniques and the body works up in one piece perfect for beginners looking to get started in amigurumi materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a buff 0334 1 ball contrast b café latte 0360 1 ball measurements approx 9 23 cm tall x 5 12 5 cm wide including legs
